title: Government’s “Ape Gamana- Our March” kicks off at Rivarina Hotel.
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Chandana Perera) A workshop titled Ape Gamana (Our March) of the Sri Lankan Government was kicked-off at Rivarina Hotel Conference Hall at Beruwala, this morning on 7th August. Ape Gamana workshop, is the first of a chain of educational seminars which was organized by the Presidential Secretariat,…
